fees.description:
Charged when a direct debit payment has dishonoured or reversed. This charge is not subject to GST.
For more information on these fees and other fees, please visit energylocalsretail.com.au/fees
May be charged when you move into a property or change retailer. Actual fee may vary.
May be charged when you move out and require a final meter read. Actual fee may vary.

electricityContract.terms: Energy Locals offers no lock in contracts or exit fees. Prices may vary in accordance with the terms and conditions. See energylocalsretail.com.au/terms for full terms and conditions.
electricityContract.variation: Due to changes in the market and economic conditions, we may update your tariff and/or fees. We will provide at least 5 business days' notice before the change takes place.

eligibility.information: Available to customers on eligible network tariffs. Feed-In Tariffs are only valid if applicable.
